column5: The Ocean Room is a lovely beachy room in seaside cottage. Suitable for 2 guests (possible 3rd guest). Hardwood floors & private bathroom. Relax and hear the sound of the ocean on the best front porch swing in the East Historical/UTMB District. Near Downtown Strand & Cruise Ship Port. Walk to beach.
column8: Private Room In Lovely Seaside Cottage East End
